Personally I'm cool with whatever you up, Leon. I'm at the stage  where whatever you offer I know has to be good. Though I have to say Leather Nun is extraordinary as is anything by Dave Sheridan. If people want I can try and up Mindwarp - a co production between Sheridan and Dave Shrier. Sheridan was a genuis with stoires and panels akin to Escher.

I am a big fan of Steve Niles and just completed reading Freaks of Heartland and now reading Big Foot. I was hoping if you could upload Steve Nile's Aleister Arcane , Wake the Dead and Criminal Macabre. Thank You.
